fi.tuni.tiko.tulojamenolaskuri

Class DatabaseManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
      • fi.tuni.tiko.tulojamenolaskuri.DatabaseManager

  • public class DatabaseManager
extends android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
    This class manages the entry data database. The month in this database is saved in the such a format that January is 1 instead of 0.
    Since:
    2020.04.20
    Version:
    1.7
    Author:
    Olli Pertovaara
